Text:
Nice to see gems like this out on PB!
Great audio/video quality and you can even learn french, spanish or japanese by switching between the subtitles. Excellent work lord_terabyte!
Thanks, I've been looking for this for awhile

The Last Supper is a 1995 film directed by Stacy Title. It stars Cameron Diaz, Ron Eldard, Annabeth Gish, Jonathan Penner and Courtney B. Vance as five very liberal graduate school students who invite a string of right-wing extremists whose political views they disagree with to dinner in order to murder them.
